titlestmt.titleproper: Finding aid for the Copley family (Ann Arbor, Mich.) photograph collection.

profiledesc.creation: Encoded finding aid created from MARC record by Dallas Pillen
profiledesc.langusage: The finding aid is written in English

did.unittitle: Copley family (Ann Arbor, Mich.) photograph collection.

descgrp.accessrestrict: The collection is open for research use.

archdesc.bioghist: Family of Frank O. Copley, professor of Latin at the University of Michigan.
archdesc.scopecontent: Photos of the family home at 300 Oak Way, Ann Arbor Township, Mich., later site of Veterans Administration Hospital parking garage. Includes combination of photocopies and photoprints, with jpeg images of 2 prints.
